abstract: Air Force announces Lt Gen John Hesterman has been fired and will retire due to investigation that found he sent inappropriate emails to lower-ranking female officer.
lead_paragraph: A senior Air Force general officer has been fired from his job and will retire after an investigation found that he had sent inappropriate emails five years ago to a lower-ranking female officer.

headline.main: Air Force General Fired Over Inappropriate Emails
headline.print_headline: Air Force General Fired Over Inappropriate Emails

snippet: A senior Air Force general officer has been fired from his job and will retire after an investigation found that he had sent inappropriate emails five years ago to a lower-ranking female officer.
